Name: Объемная История
About the game: Volumetric History - A free educational project about epoch-making events and people in the history of Russia, implemented in the form of exciting mini-games and videos in 360 format. The project supports Virtual Reality (VR) technology! The story becomes voluminous, interesting and informative!
